## Submitting an issue

## Before submitting an issue, check the following checklist

- [ ] I searched existing issues to make sure this is not a duplicate.
- [ ] This feature request fits the scope of harbor-templater (template-driven project scaffolding).

## The problem

Describe the problem you are trying to solve.

### Proposed solution

Describe what you would like to happen.

### Alternatives considered

Describe alternative solutions or features you considered.

### Additional context

Add any other context, examples, or references that help explain the request.
